Name: Purple Coneflower
Description: A lovely purple coneflower that's pleasantly sweet. It is also known as echinacea.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Un hermosa flor púrpura que es agradablemente dulce.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 기분좋게 달콤한, 사랑스러운 자주루드베키아. 에키네시아라고 불리기도 합니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine wundervolle purpurne Blume, die erfrischen süß duftet. Auch bekannt als Echinacea.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une belle échinacée pourpre agréablement douce. Il est également connu sous le nom d'échinacée.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy gyönyörű lila kasvirág, mely kellemesen édes. Echinacea néven is ismert.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 心地よい紫色のバレンギク。「エキナセア」という名でも知られている。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma linda margarida roxa que é agradavelmente doce. Também é conhecido como ourico da Terra.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Прелестная фиолетовый цветок, приятный на вкус.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 可爱的紫色花花，味道甜美。它也被称为紫雏菊。
